mapper.insert: INSERT INTO File (file_Org_Nm, file_Save_Nm, file_Dir, file_Size, file_Ext, file_Category, reg_Date) values ( #{fileOrgNm}, #{fileSaveNm}, #{fileDir}, #{fileSize}, #{contentType}, #{fileCategory}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT file_no, file_Org_Nm, file_Save_Nm, file_Dir, file_Size file_Ext, file_Category, reg_Date, memo FROM File;
